item.title: Report X-2024061443
item.description:
Report X-2024061443

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-13
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED WHILE STILL IN A SMALLS BAG FROM THE UNLOAD AND SENT TO THE SMALL SORT. THE DEBAGGER NOTICED THAT IT WAS WET FROM THE INSIDE OUT. HE LEFT THE AREA AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. THE RESPONDER THEN PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE INTO A DMP GREEN BAG. THE EQUIPMENT WAS DECONTAMINATED FOLLOWING THE DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TRANSPORTED BACK TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING, IT WAS THEN DETERMINED TO BE AN UNDECLARED PACKAGE. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER: 1ZC1G375YW31120956

item.title: Report X-2024061297
item.description:
Report X-2024061297

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-14
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AN AIR PACKAGE FROM BRAZIL TO THE USA REQUIRED A PACKAGE REWRAP AT THE DESTINATION DELIVERY CENTER. DURING PACKAGE REWRAP FIVE FLAMMABLE AEROSOL DEODORANTS WERE FOUND. ADDITIONAL ITEMS IN THE BOX ARE NOT REGULATED AS DANGEROUS GOODS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM BRAZIL USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER JE8247, GERUSA MAIA REGES PINHEIRO ME, RUA JOINVILLE, 2830, SAO JOSE DOS PINHAIS 83005550.

item.title: Report E-2024060474
item.description:
Report E-2024060474

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-29
  • City: DRACUT
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 1-gallon of UN 1263 "Milesi LNB 20" was released from two (2) 2-gallon metal pails due to improper loading that impacted the trailer floor. It was reported the pails arrived damaged from XNW. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and the caller determined terminal personnel are capable of conducting clean up.
